rport.desc: Port to attack on chosen IPs

users.desc: User (ie: 'admin'), range or file with them (ie: file:./john.txt). Some built-in dics are supported ('misc/dicNames')

passwords.desc: Passwords (or file with them, same that for 'users') to test

userAsPass.desc: Test the same user as password for each one

timeout.desc: Time to wait for a response, in ms.
